00035 Hypothesis* pruneStack(stack < Hypothesis* > &s)
00036 {
00037         vector<Hypothesis*> v;
00038         unsigned int size = s.size();
00039         v.resize(size);
00040 
00041         for (unsigned int i=0; !s.empty(); i++)
00042         {
00043                 v[i] = s.top();
00044                 s.pop();
00045         }
00046         sort(v.begin(), v.end(), cmp_Hyp);
00047 
00048         for (unsigned int i=0; i<size && i<KEEP_N_BEST_HYPOS ;i++)
00049         {
00050 /*              unsigned int min = i;
00051                 for (unsigned int j=i+1; j<v.size(); j++)

00055                                 min = j;
00056                         }
00057                 }

00061                 s.push(v[i]);
00062         }
00063         //return best Hypo

00074 Hypothesis* searchTranslation(string &line, vector<trans_tab_struct>  &translationtab)
00075 {
00076         Hypothesis* minCostsHyp;
00077         vector<string> stringwords = stringSplit(line, " ");
00078         vector< stack < Hypothesis* > > stacks;
00079         stacks.resize((stringwords.size()+1));
00080         Hypothesis* h = new Hypothesis(NULL,0,0);
00081         stacks[0].push(h);
00082 
00083         vector<unsigned int> words(stringwords.size(), 0);
00084         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < words.size(); i++)
00085         {
00086 
00087                 words[i] = f.getNum(stringwords[i]);
00088 
00089                 unsigned int j = 0;
00090                 // find first occurance of word[i] in transtab
00091                 while (j < translationtab.size() && words[i] != (translationtab[j].f))
00092                 {
00093                         j++;
00094                 }
00095                 unsigned int first_occ = j;
00096 
00097                 while (!stacks[i].empty())
00098                 {
00099                         Hypothesis *prev = stacks[i].top();
00100 
00101                         // make hyps for all the possible translations
00102                         j = first_occ;
00103                         bool found_at_least_one_hypo = false;
00104                         while (j < translationtab.size() && words[i] == (translationtab[j].f))
00105                         {
00106                                 found_at_least_one_hypo = true;
00107                                 Hypothesis *h = new Hypothesis(prev, translationtab[j].relFreqF, translationtab[j].e);
00108                                 stacks[i+1].push(h);
00109                                 j++;
00110                         }
00111                         if (!found_at_least_one_hypo)
00112                         {
00113                                 // insert '(?)'
00114                                 stacks[i+1].push(new Hypothesis(prev, 0, 0));
00115                         }
00116                         stacks[i].pop();
00117                 }
00118                 minCostsHyp = pruneStack(stacks[i+1]);
00119 
00120         }
00121         // return best Hypothesis of the last stack
00122         return minCostsHyp;
00123 }

00125 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00126 {
00127 
00128         if (argc < 3)
00129         {
00130                 cerr << "ERROR: not enough parameters" << endl << "Usage: " << argv[0] << " translation-table source-document" << endl;
00131                 return 0; // EXIT_FAILURE;
00132         }
00133 
00134         string line;
00135 
00136         // open files
00137         ifstream trans_tab(argv[1]);
00138         ifstream src_doc(argv[2]);
00139         if (!trans_tab.good())
00140         {
00141                 cerr << "ERROR: Opening translation table ("<< argv[1] <<") failed." << endl;
00142                 return 1; // EXIT_FAILURE;
00143         }
00144         if (!src_doc.good())
00145         {
00146                 cerr << "ERROR: Opening source document ("<< argv[2] <<") failed." << endl;
00147                 return 1; // EXIT_FAILURE;
00148         }
00149 
00150         unsigned int i = 0;
00151         vector<struct trans_tab_struct> trans_tab_vec;
00152         trans_tab_vec.resize(VECTOR_INIT_SIZE);
00153 
00154         vector<string> tokens;
00155 
00156         // read trans_tab into trans_tab_vec
00157         while (getline(trans_tab, line))
00158         {
00159                 struct trans_tab_struct current;
00160                 char *pch;
00161                 // line is formatted like: <double> <double> # <string> # <string>
00162 
00163                 // strtok isn't the right thing to use here. see manpage (Bugs)
00164                 // we may re-implement stringSplit if we need to make it more efficient
00165                 vector<string> line_vec = stringSplit(line, " ");
00166 
00167                 istringstream isstrF(line_vec[0]);
00168                 double temp;
00169                 isstrF >> temp;
00170                 current.relFreqF = temp;
00171 
00172                 istringstream isstrE(line_vec[1]);
00173                 isstrE >> temp;
00174                 current.relFreqE = temp;
00175 
00176                 current.f = f.insert(line_vec[3]);
00177 
00178                 current.e = e.insert(line_vec[5]);
00179 
00180                 if (i >= trans_tab_vec.size())
00181                 {
00182                         trans_tab_vec.resize(trans_tab_vec.size() + VECTOR_RESIZE);
00183                 }
00184                 trans_tab_vec[i] = current;
00185                 // cout << f.getWord(current.f) << " " << current.relFreqF << endl;
00186                 i++;
00187         }
00188         trans_tab_vec.resize(i);
00189 
00190         // translate src_doc
00191         while (getline(src_doc, line))
00192         {
00193                 Hypothesis* transHyp = searchTranslation(line, trans_tab_vec);
00194                 string translation = "";//e.getWord(transHyp.trans);
00195                 while (transHyp->prevHyp != NULL)
00196                 {
00197                         translation = e.getWord(transHyp->trans) + " " + translation;
00198                         transHyp = transHyp->prevHyp;
00199                 }
00200                 cout << translation << endl;
00201         }
00202 
00203         return 0; //EXIT_SUCCESS;
00204 }
